Title: Nightmare Hospital
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Zach Callison, Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, Grace Rolek
Plot: Steven and Connie must sneak into a hospital to recover Rose's sword from Connie's mother.
